title: Arab Leaders Condemn Remarks by U.S. Ambassador to Israel
summary_full: The ambassador, Mike Huckabee, seemed to endorse Israeli control of lands stretching from Egypt to Iraq. He said his comments were taken out of context.
summary_public: The ambassador, Mike Huckabee, seemed to endorse Israeli control of lands stretching from Egypt to Iraq. He said his comments were taken out of context.

IL.label: neutral
